comments.content: Just noticed that "nova delete" will send out "compute.instance.shutdown.*" notifications, not "compute.instance.power_off.*".  As I know, "compute.instance.power_off.*" will be published if you try to stop instance.  But you cannot stop an instance in vm_state resized. Could you give more details about your test? E.g. commands you use, logs you observed the issue. Thanks.
